attributes.action: The British people want a bank holiday on the day of the royal wedding
attributes.additional_details:
With the popularity of the royal family decreasing it is a great time to rekindle national pride and reward the British public by granting them a Bank holiday so they can reap the rewards of their tax payments. Through a bank holiday more Great British people will be able to view the event, generating a sense of national pride and a feeling of Britishness that shall catapualt future generations into greatness. 
Ps God save the Queen
attributes.background: The great Bristish people deserve a bank holiday on the day of Prince Harry’s wedding as it is through the British taxpayers hard work that this wedding can be financed so they deserve to be able to see what they are paying for on a day of national importance.
